Disease.content:

Paragraph: Gram - negative bacilli were the most common causative organisms and 69 % of these infections were cured .

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, the only disease-related term is "infections". It is mentioned that 69% of these infections were cured, indicating that infections are the diseases caused by the gram-negative bacilli. Therefore, "infections" is the valid disease entity in this paragraph.
